title: FPS Drop Help
body:
[ISSUE RESOLVED]

I logged into league, queued up with some friends and got into game. Everything was normal except it took me a little longer to load into than normal. We get into plat and my FPS is fluctuating between 20 and 5, I usually play around 60. My laptop was running league normally yesterday and I didn't change/update anything so I don't know what happened. I have Windows 10 and everything is up to date. While in game I opened my Task Manager and nothing was running more than normal. Also, I was watching YouTube videos after and the video was playing at half speed with the audio playing normally and it would buffer every 10 or so seconds to resync, but only when I put the video in full screen mode. Can someone explain to me what I did to my computer?

replies.body: It sounds like there may be a computer issue causing a hiccup with your game.  There are a few solutions to this, but as a first step I would recommend updating your graphics driver since there may issues with other products like Youtube.  These steps as well as a few other troubleshoot instructions are available at our[ FPS Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Hopefully this well get you fixed up for good, but let me know if you have any problems!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EIwnhHwl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-20T16:55:56.207+0000)
>
> It sounds like there may be a computer issue causing a hiccup with your game.  There are a few solutions to this, but as a first step I would recommend updating your graphics driver since there may issues with other products like Youtube.  These steps as well as a few other troubleshoot instructions are available at our[ FPS Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Hopefully this well get you fixed up for good, but let me know if you have any problems!

> [{quoted}](name=Zaky Bang,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EIwnhHwl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-20T10:55:18.826+0000)
>
> Check mode of alimentation...
> Normal, economy or high perforrmance!!

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EIwnhHwl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-20T06:43:00.893+0000)
>
> Restarting your computer should solve this for the most part. If it doesn't; 
> 
> Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.
> 
> http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg

Thank you so much for responding, I restarted my laptop and let it rest and the issue went away

Check mode of alimentation...
Normal, economy or high perforrmance!!
